Posts.Content: On 3/6/2008 Kelleen wrote: I'm wondering if there are any surgeons in Northern Michigan that perform this surgery. There are a handful of plastic surgeons around the US offering the DIEP flap breast reconstruction procedure. This article tells you how to find DIEP flap surgeons in your area and what questions to ask: http://www.prma-enhance.com/index.cfm/PageID/4262
Posts.Title: DIEP

Posts.Content: There are a handful of plastic surgeons around the US offering the DIEP flap breast reconstruction procedure. This article tells you how to find DIEP flap surgeons in your area and what questions to ask: http://www.prma-enhance.com/index.cfm/PageID/4262
Posts.Title: Finding A DIEP flap surgeon

Posts.Content: There are a handful of plastic surgeons around the US offering the DIEP flap breast reconstruction procedure but you may have to travel. This article tells you how to find DIEP flap surgeons in your area and what questions to ask: http://www.prma-enhance.com/index.cfm/PageID/4262
Posts.Title: DIEP Flap
